attributes.action: Cap Council Tax % Increases to no higher than inflation set by themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ALL Local Councils should not be allowed to increase the Council TAX any higher than the Government stated Inflation Rate to ensure that people are not automatically made worse off as a direct result.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
